official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on -Phenyl-7-(4,4,5,6-tetramentyl-1,3,2-dioxaborolan-2-yl)-quin oline (OSIP-690520, quinolone boronate).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on -Phenyl-7-(4,4,5,6-tetramentyl-1,3,2-dioxaborolan-2-yl)-quin oline (OSIP-690520, quinolone boronate).
